section.title: Building basic calculator application
section.para: The basiccalculator sca application is provided with a build script.

listitem.para: Set the environnement variable TRENTINO_HOME to point to the location of your installed Trentino distribution
Make sure you have Cmake installed and part of your PATH
Make sure Java Version 1.6.* is part of your PATH
Open your Terminal or console (On windows use the visual studio command prompt)

section.para: After the build is finished, a folder BasicCalculator will be created next to BasicCalculator_Source. That folder contains a ready to deploy SCA contrubution.

listitem.para: Open your trentino console application by executing ${TRENTINO_HOME}/bin/TrentinoConsole
You first have to boot Trentino. For that purpose type the command "boot" in the console.
Now you can deploy (install) your application into the runtime. For that purpose just enter the following command into the console: install C:\TrentinoContributions\BasicCalculator myuri
You have already installed BasicCalculator. Congratulations! :)
